name: server
description: Server part of the AppointDent project.

scripts.test: npm run broker & dotenv -- npm run execute-dropdb-on-services && npm run prepare-for-test & wait-on http://localhost:3002 http://localhost:3003 http://localhost:3004 http://localhost:3005 && npm run execute-newman-on-services && fkill 'npm run prepare-for-test' && fkill 'npm run start' && fkill 'npm run broker'
scripts.prepare-for-test: dotenv -- concurrently  "npm run start --prefix ../services/session-service" "npm run start --prefix  ../services/appointment-service" "npm run start --prefix ../services/dentist-service" "npm run start --prefix ../services/notification-service" "npm run start --prefix ../services/patient-service"
scripts.execute-newman-on-services: dotenv -- npm run newman --prefix ../services/appointment-service && npm run newman  --prefix ../services/dentist-service && npm run newman  --prefix ../services/notification-service && npm run newman  --prefix ../services/patient-service
scripts.execute-dropdb-on-services: dotenv -- npm run dropdb  --prefix ../services/session-service && npm run dropdb --prefix ../services/appointment-service && npm run dropdb  --prefix ../services/dentist-service && npm run dropdb  --prefix ../services/notification-service && npm run dropdb  --prefix ../services/patient-service
